description.compact: An EventSubscriber knows which events it is interested in.

docblock.description: If an EventSubscriber is added to an EventDispatcher, the manager invokes {@link getSubscribedEvents} and registers the subscriber as a listener for all returned events.

description.compact: Returns an array of event names this subscriber wants to listen to.

docblock.description:
The array keys are event names and the value can be:
* The method name to call (priority defaults to 0) * An array composed of the method name to call and the priority * An array of arrays composed of the method names to call and respective priorities, or 0 if unset
For instance:
* array('eventName' => 'methodName') * array('eventName' => array('methodName', $priority)) * array('eventName' => array(array('methodName1', $priority), array('methodName2'))

return.description: The event names to listen to
